allow: Bash(for category in leadership vision integrity ethics accountability transparency communication responsiveness publicinterest)

Bash(do python -c "import os; from supabase import create_client; from dotenv import load_dotenv; load_dotenv\(\); supabase = create_client\(os.getenv\(''SUPABASE_URL''\), os.getenv\(''SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY''\)\); result = supabase.table\(''evaluations_v40''\).select\(''evaluator_ai''\).eq\(''politician_id'', ''8c5dcc89''\).execute\(\); ai_counts = {}; [ai_counts.update\({item[''evaluator_ai'']: ai_counts.get\(item[''evaluator_ai''], 0\) + 1}\) for item in result.data]; chatgpt = ai_counts.get\(''ChatGPT'', 0\); print\(f''ChatGPT: {chatgpt}/1275''\); exit\(0 if chatgpt >= 1275 else 1\)")
Bash(for cat in expertise leadership vision integrity ethics accountability transparency communication responsiveness publicinterest)
Bash(CATS="expertise leadership vision integrity ethics accountability transparency communication responsiveness publicinterest")
